#summary how to record a screen cast

=== SCREENR ===

 # [http://screenr.com/ go to the site]
 # click red record button
 # java application should start up
 # select desired preferences (eg sound, screensize)
 # if recording sound, ensure your microphone is connected
 # click 'record' - keep your recording under 5 minutes
 # click stop when done
 # you will have to create a twitter account at the end if you have not used before
 # click 'do not tweet this screencast'
 # you should receive a link to the screencast
 # provide this link back to your support resource
